summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Smart Cooking PWA - Italian recipe generation app. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend working with Italian design, AI recipe generation with Gemini working, user authentication, recipe saving, and Stripe payment integration all operational.

AI recipe generation with Gemini integration
Landing page loads with Italian design
Recipe generation page with ingredient management
Pricing page with correct plans (Free €0, Unlimited €2.99)
